item.description:
Dick's Beantown Comedy Escape @ Crowne Plaza Hotel

COMEDIANS: Jim McCue and TBA

Showtimes: Fri and Sat 9pm $15.00pp Except Special Events

EXIT 10 OFF MASS PIKE TO 290 E. TAKE EXIT 17-RT9. TAKE A LEFT AT TOP OF EXIT. AT 2ND SET OF LIGHTS AT BOTTOM OF THE HILL, GO LEFT ONTO WORCESTER CTR BLVD. HOTEL IS ON THE RIGHT..THERE IS A GARAGE FOR PARKING OR THE STREET.

THEY HAVE A DINNER SPECIAL WITH THE SHOW...LET ME KNOW IF ANYONE IS INTERESTED.
item.name: Dick's Beantown Comedy Escape @ Crowne Plaza Hotel
